column5: We’ll now be having more sleepless nightsas the Supreme court just voted to curb voting rights.This devastating ruling will be hurting minoritiesand that’s has been at the top of Republican priorities.Now the Republican party can happily gloatThey’ve successfully silenced much of the minority vote.This is a huge blow to our so challenged democracyand serves to further display the Supreme Court’s hypocrisyIt ’s now more important ….after their votes were castthat we get the John Lewis Voter Act passed.
